body_html: @ashimb9: You might be getting Nans when your mini-batch contains only a single class. I'm not sure of that function's behavior if either of the partitions is empty, or what a good default behavior would be. I don't believe that behavior is defined for RankNet or LambdaRank, where the assumption is that you are dealing with labeled pairs.
